---
title: StepwiseLH
subtitle: Life History Stepwise Probability Distributions based on data-limited fisheries
---

This R package allows fisheries scientists to generate probability distributions for missing life history parameters of sharks, groupers, and other taxa to assist data-limited stock assessments

## Repository

<https://github.com/PIFSCstockassessments/StepwiseLH>
